message.content:
To retrieve all records from an SQLite database table where the "age" field is greater than 32 in Python, you can use the following code:

```python
import sqlite3

# Connect to the database
conn = sqlite3.connect('your_database.db')
cursor = conn.cursor()

# Execute the SQL query
query = "SELECT * FROM your_table WHERE age > 32"
cursor.execute(query)

# Fetch all the records
records = cursor.fetchall()

# Print the results
for record in records:
    print(record)

# Close the database connection
conn.close()
```

Replace `'your_database.db'` with the path to your SQLite database file and `'your_table'` with the name of the table you want to query. This code will retrieve all records from the specified table where the "age" field is greater than 32.
